tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficSignals (
  signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intersection_id INT,
  signal_type VARCHAR(20),
  signal_status VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (intersection_id) REFERENCES Intersections(intersection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intersection_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_count INT,
  wait_time_seconds INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (intersection_id) REFERENCES Intersections(intersection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AverageWaitTimes (
  average_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intersection_id INT,
  avg_wait_time DECIMAL,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (intersection_id) REFERENCES Intersections(intersection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
  signal_id INT NOT NULL,
  wait_time_seconds INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (signal_id) REFERENCES traffic_signals(signal_id)
);
